You will work in a hybrid, fast\\-paced organization where scientists, engineers, and product managers work together to build customer facing experiences. You will collaborate with and mentor other junior scientists to raise the bar of scientific research in Amazon. Your work will directly impact our customers in the form of products and services that make use of speech, language, and computer vision technologies.
   

  

 We are looking for a candidate with strong technical experiences a passion for building scientific driven solutions in a fast\\-paced environment. You should have good understanding of NLP models (e.g. LSTM, transformer based models) and where to apply them in different business cases. You leverage your exceptional technical expertise, a sound understanding of the fundamentals of Computer Science, and practical experience of building large\\-scale distributed systems to creating reliable, scalable, and high\\-performance products. In addition to technical depth, you must possess exceptional communication skills and understand how to influence key stakeholders.
   

  

 You will be joining a select group of people making history producing one of the most highly rated products in Amazon's history, so if you are looking for a challenging and innovative role where you can solve important problems while growing as a leader, this may be the place for you.
   

  

 A day in the life
   

  

 You will be working with a group of talented scientists on researching algorithm and running experiments to test scientific proposal/solutions to improve our sensitive contents detection and mitigation. This will involve collaboration with partner teams including engineering, PMs, data annotators, and other scientists to discuss data quality, policy, and model development. You will mentor other scientists, review and guide their work, help develop roadmaps for the team. You work closely with partner teams across Alexa to deliver platform features that require cross\\-team leadership.

This role will involve working closely with business stakeholders, product owners, and other technical teams to translate business requirements into scalable and efficient sales, quoting, and contracting solutions. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successful Sales Cloud, Apttus CPQ, and CLM implementations (Conga and/or Docusign), along with strong development skills and extensive experience with tech stack integration across multiple platforms.
 



 Background: This engagement is the first step in the consolidation of two different environments, TCRM (Conga Apptus) and SCRM (SF CPQ, with a lot of customizations). Release 1 (called “R1”) is the first phase in moving all business to the TCRM (Conga Apptus) platform.
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* Lead the design, development, configuration, and implementation of Apttus CPQ solutions on the Salesforce platform.
* Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to gather, analyze, and translate business requirements into technical specifications for CPQ solutions.
* Design and implement robust integrations between Apttus CPQ/Salesforce and other critical systems, with a specific focus on billing platforms like Zuora and leveraging Mulesoft as the primary integration platform.
* Perform unit testing, integration testing, and support user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure the quality and accuracy of CPQ solutions.
* Contribute to technical design discussions, code reviews, and solution architecture.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex issues related to Apttus CPQ functionality and integrations.



  





**Functional Daily/Weekly Activities:** 



* Manage/Lead other Offshore team Developers
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex issues related to Apttus CPQ functionality and integrations.
* Intake user stories from onshore team
* Ask follow up questions for clarity ahead of development
* complete development based on user stories in Conga Apttus

* execute those unit tests to ensure functioning code ahead of promotion
* Stage code for promotion
* Integrations work with Conga Apttus, Zuroa, Mulesoft
* After development sprints are complete, participate in formal testing cycles (SIT, E2E, UAT)



**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience specifically with Apttus CPQ implementation and development.
* Demonstrated experience with Mulesoft for enterprise\\-level integrations, including designing, developing, and deploying APIs and integrations.
* Strong understanding of CPQ processes, including product catalog, pricing, quoting, discounting, and contract management.
* Proficiency in Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Web Components (LWC), and JavaScript.
* Experience with Salesforce configuration (Flows, Process Builder, Workflow Rules, Validation Rules, Approval Processes).
* Solid understanding of Salesforce data model and best practices.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, analytical, and communication skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast\\-paced environment.
